title: Text in public chat name starts flickering when quickly typed
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug
*Summary*: when you quickly type name in "Join Public Chat"  name starts flickering without any user interaction; CPU usage jumps to ~70-90%.

#### Expected behavior
name is shown

#### Actual behavior
name starts flickering without any user interaction; CPU usage jumps to ~70-90%.

### Reproduction

- Open Status
- Click on +
- Set focus to field below "Join public chat" and quickly (as much as you can) type any text (`a`-`z` chars)

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: nightly 10/08/2018
* Operating System: Mac OSx High Sierra
* Video: http://take.ms/fqqOC

#### Logs

